name: Parasite Life BETA7 - A Blue Critter Inspired game
name_original: Parasite Life BETA7 - A Blue Critter Inspired game
description:
This is Parasite Life! Here you play as a parasite who's goal is to get to the surface. Encounter different Critters and Enemies as you adventure. (also this is my first game made from scratch btw)

beta 7: added the following critters and enemies: null

added rainbow plant, the way to get to the surface.

Tip:

Enemies and Critters can easily be confused. To avoid confusion, look at the eyes. All enemies have red eyes(except for the slugoo, a green slug thing). Critters have black or white eyes.

Enemie List:

Beginner EnemiesReptileTortleMORE SOONAppears: dirt caves, plaforms, other upcoming placesMidgame EnemiesLizardSlugooAlienSpiderAppears: platforms, caves, other upcoming placesEndgame EnemiesDemonTyrannosaurusRexMORE SOONAppears: platforms, other upcoming places

Critter List:

Beginner critters:FriendlyReptileRaptorAppears: almost everywhereMidgame Critters:AlbertosaurusBeetleAppears: platforms, dirt cavesEndgame Critters:ArmadilloAppears: caves

Controls:

R to roll

arrow keys to move and climb ladders

spacebar to jump

Guide on health:

if you are damaged, your health decreases by one. if you find a heart, walk into the heart to regenerate 1 hp. If you die, EVERYTHING ingame is reset. Don't die!

CREDITS:

Blue Critter Games for the Blue Critter adventure which inspired me to make this :D

also the file name for beta 7 of parasitelife is beta 6, ignore that as the version is actually beta 7.
